name: Lava Lounge Pass (2 Weeks)
description:
Located in Ember Bay.
• Quick Travel to All Cities
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
• And more! All within easy reach, for those who enjoy the ultimate convenience.

name: Lava Lounge Pass
description:
Located in Ember Bay.
• Quick Travel to All Cities
• Crafting Stations
• Bank and Guild Bank Access
• Mystic Forge
• Merchants
• And more! All within easy reach, for those who enjoy the ultimate convenience.

name: Bundle of Petrified Wood
description: Can be consumed for unbound magic or traded with Scholar Surra.

name: Bowl of Island Fruit Paste
description: Ingredient

name: Karmic Retribution
description: Permanently gain bonus karma while killing foes in Ember Bay. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Infinite Mist Defensive Potion
description:
Decreases incoming damage in the Fractals of the Mists. Grants five stacks of the standard potion.
With Fractal Attunement Mastery, converts a portion of your agony resistance to toughness.
Turn in unwanted potions to Dessa's Alchemist for Fractal Relics.

name: Contract of Patronage
description: An ornate scroll certifying your patronage of the Circus Spectacular circus troupe.

name: Valuable Pearl
description:
Deliver to the Castaway Vice Chief.
Task Item

name: Large Wave of the Solid Ocean
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Captain Grumby's Ship Call Bell
description:
Double-click to gain karma.
This tattered old bell was given to you by Captain Grumby as a sign of your friendship.
<c=@flavor>"It's not much, but this was all I had left of my ship when I got stuck here. I want you to have it." —Captain Grumby</c>

name: Mursaat Wings Backpack
description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

name: Block of the Solid Ocean
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Delicate Egg
description:
Deliver to the Castaway Vice Chief.
Task Item

name: Stone Dwarf Thumb
description: Surprisingly well manicured

name: Skritt Worker Contract
description: Double-click to hire a skritt to search through a skritt stash for shinies.

name: Mursaat Robes
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Destroyer Sample
description: A usable sample of recently augmented Destroyer flesh.

name: Recipe: Sweet Curried Mussels
description: Double-click to learn a recipe

name: Bundle of Petrified Wood
description: Can be consumed for unbound magic or traded with Scholar Surra.

name: Male Norn Holo-Dancer
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Large Block of the Solid Ocean
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

details.description:
+30% Magic Find

+15% Experience from Kills

description:

description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Large Crystal Block of the Solid Ocean
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Encrusted Ring
description: This encrusted ring appears to be humming with magic.

name: Large Female Norn Holo-Dancer
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Sentient Aberration
description: Double-click to feed 25 Dragonite Ore and 25 Empyreal Fragments to the Sentient Aberration. The aberration can devour a limited amount of materials each day.

name: Petrified Karka Egg
description:
<c=@flavor>Even with the effects of the fluctuating magical energies on this island, this egg must date from sometime around the rising of Orr.
—Scientist Vratt</c>

name: Recipe: For Science
description: Unlocks the recipe to craft For Science.

name: Endeavor
description: <c=@flavor>This weapon is used to craft the legendary mace Eureka.</c>

name: Female Norn Holo-Dancer
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Huge Valuable Pearl
description:
Deliver to the Castaway Vice Chief.
Task Item

name: Large Male Norn Holo-Dancer
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Unbound Mining Pick
description:
Used to mine all metals.

Rewards unbound magic on each swing in addition to mining results.

name: Recipe: Island Pudding
description: Double-click to learn a recipe

name: Endless Jade Construct Tonic
description: Double-click to transform for 15 minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Mini Holographic Taimi
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Rurik's Engagement Ring
description:
<c=@flavor>A token of my eternal love.
—Althea Barradin</c>

name: Piece of Damaged Ship
description: This piece of wood glows with a strange hue. Captain Grumby might know what to do with this.

name: Strange Rock
description: This strange rock appears to be humming with magic.

name: Unbound Harvesting Sickle
description:
Used to gather all plants.

Rewards unbound magic in addition to harvesting results.

name: Aqueous Amulet
description:
<c=@flavor>This amulet appears to have a minor dampening effect on the Destroyers, and it is always strangely cool to the touch.
—Researcher Twilli</c>

name: Slab of the Solid Ocean
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Mursaat Wings Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Bundle of Petrified Wood
description: Can be consumed for unbound magic or traded with Scholar Surra.

name: Bundle of Petrified Wood
description: Can be consumed for unbound magic or traded with Scholar Surra.

name: Bag of Fractal Relics
description: Contains 15 Fractal Relics.

name: Ancient Mursaat Relic
description: An ancient mursaat relic that can be used to harvest Unbound Magic.

name: Round Lump
description: This round lump appears to be humming with magic.

name: Ember Bay Cache
description: Double-click to gain Dragonite Ore, Empyreal Fragments, Obsidian Shards, Mystic Clovers, Unbound Magic, Testimonies of Heroics, and the choice of headgear, shoulders, or Petrified Wood.

name: Infinite Mist Offensive Potion
description:
Increases outgoing damage in the Fractals of the Mists. Grants five stacks of the standard potion.
With Fractal Attunement Mastery, converts a portion of your agony resistance to precision.
Turn in unwanted potions to Dessa's Alchemist for Fractal Relics.

name: Recipe: Endeavor
description: Unlocks the recipe to craft Endeavor.

name: Recipe: Hypothesis
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Hypothesis.

name: Chest of the Ember Bay Hero
description: Double-click to open. Contains 1 Sip of Liquid Karma, 1 Petrified Wood, 25 Unbound Magic, and 1 Scrap of Maguuma Mastery (Autoconsume).

name: Furrocious Cat Ears
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other helmet. This skin will be unlocked in your wardrobe for future use.

name: Broken Shadowstone
description: This artifact has spots in it where bloodstone slivers could potentially fit.

name: Class I Rift Stabilizer
description:
A device for stabilizing unstable magic rifts.

Double-click to equip.

name: Mysterious Device
description: This device looks like it does something, but you don't know how to turn it on.

name: Class II Rift Stabilizer
description:
A high-powered device for stabilizing severely unstable magic rifts.

Double-click to equip.

name: Bottle of Highly Concentrated Krait Oil
description: <c=@flavor>This unlabeled bottle has a disturbingly murky and thick liquid in it.</c>

name: Broken Rift Stabilizer
description: Whatever this device did, it's clearly not going to do it anymore.

name: Spectral Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Reforged Shadowstone
description: A shadowstone with bloodstone slivers socketed into it.

name: Beta Cannon Blueprint
description: Use to construct a cannon build site. The cannon's primary function is to deal heavy area damage to players. The cannon has a range of 3,750 and requires 50 supply to complete.

name: Endless Halloween Enchantment
description: Used in the Mystic Forge to create endless versions of Halloween tonics.

name: Gargoyle Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Phospholuminescent Infusion
description:
Double-click to apply to an unused infusion slot. Adds a festive glow.
<c=@Warning>Warning!</c>
<c=@Flavor>Captain's Council recommends avoiding direct contact with this substance.</c>

description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

description: Used by the Mystic Forge to upgrade siege weapons.

name: Mad Moon
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Greater Gift of Candy Corn
description: Double-click to upgrade your home-instance candy corn node. Node can be mined once per day.

name: Polyluminescent Undulating Refractor (Teal)
description: Double-click to apply this to a trinket.

buff.description:
+12 Condition Damage
+12 Precision
+12 Toughness
+12 Power
+12 Vitality
+12 Healing Power
+12 Ferocity

name: Hovering Mad Mirror
description:
Travel. Double-click to equip a bundle that changes how you move around the world.

Using this item automatically equips it while running outside of combat. The effect can be removed by using the Stop Riding skill or by double-clicking this item again.

name: Vibrant Dye Kit
description: Double-click to gain one random Vibrant-inspired color. Includes a chance at 1 of 6 exclusive colors.

name: Guaranteed Wardrobe Unlock
description:
Consuming this will unlock one random wardrobe option that you do not already own in the following categories:
* Equipment Skins (exotic or less)
* Outfits
* Dyes
* Gliders
* Minis
* Finishers
* Mail Carriers
Last Update: April 2022.

name: Aqua Satin Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Customer Appreciation Package
description:
This key will unlock one Black Lion Chest containing random Gem Store merchandise, including some rare items not sold separately.

Black Lion Chests can be found randomly on enemies or bought from the trading post.

name: Ruby Red Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Magenta Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Pumpkin Orange Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Plush Baby Aurene Backpack
description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Marjory's Shrouded Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Swashbuckler's Package
description:
Usable by any character, this pack comes with everything a pirate captain needs to pillage, plunder, and rule the high seas.

Appearance skins override the look of your equipment and have no stats of their own.

name: Crystalline Dragon Wings Backpack
description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

description: <c=@flavor>An icy chill emanates from the ring.</c>

description: Used to make grawl shrines in Bitterfrost Frontier.

description: Double-click to combine Dragon Hatchling Doll Adornments, Eyes, Hide, Frame, and Stuffing to create a Dragon Hatchling Doll.

description: Double-click to present a burnt offering to Koda.

name: Token of Affection
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Grawl Firestone
description: Used to brew a thaw elixir. Firestones can be purchased from the grawl.

description: Unlocks this skill for use while wielding Koda's Flame.

name: Exalted Portal Stone
description: This stone shimmers like translucent gold and teleports you back to the egg chamber in Tarir.
